item.title: CVE-2023-39992|2024-08-02T18:18:10.191Z -- vcita.com -- online%20booking%20%26%20scheduling%20calendar%20for%20wordpress%20by%20vcita
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in vCita.Com Online Booking & Scheduling Calendar for WordPress by vcita plugin <=Â 4.3.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-37262|2024-07-22T13:45:39.213Z -- vcita.com -- online%20booking%20%26%20scheduling%20calendar%20for%20wordpress%20by%20vcita
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in vCita.Com Online Booking & Scheduling Calendar for WordPress by vcita allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Online Booking & Scheduling Calendar for WordPress by vcita: from n/a through 4.4.2.
